page.title: 10RECREATION IN OSSETT
page.content: There are quite a few recreation facilities in Ossett.Squash,swimming and football are some examples. The swimming instructor Mr.Smith gives lessons to Junior and Secondary children.The pool is small compared to others.Non swimmers are taught the basic strokes,swimmers can take tests as they improve and awarded badges if they pass. Most churches and schools have Guide and Scout groups attached to them. Ossett Sporting Boys Club provides various activities that include football,table_tennis and pool. For the more energetic there are karate and judo clubs. For the less energetic there is an angling club.Being a member allows you to fish in certain areas. Ossett is well served by leisure facilities.
